data.title: Royal Borough of Windsor and Maidenhead
data.meta_description:
Royal Borough of Windsor and Maidenhead | 4,821 followers on LinkedIn. The Royal Borough of Windsor & Maidenhead is located 15 minutes from Heathrow Airport and less than 30 miles from central London. It has rich historical connections blended with a unique royal patronage.

With its international reputation and permanent presence in the top ten list of â€˜must visitâ€™ places in the world, the Royal Borough of Windsor & Maidenhead blends rich cultural heritage with successful modern business development.
data.text:
We have a brilliant opportunity for a weekend Library Advisor to join us! This is a part-time, permanent role based at Maidenhead Library. You will be required to work on Saturdays and / or Sundays with additional hours available during school, college and university holidays. Your role will involve: Delivering excellent customer service to library customers Dealing with enquiries Assisting customers with digital support Undertaking a range of library-related tasks as requested by the senior staff on duty What we are looking for: Someone who loves helping people A love of books and reading An understanding of the value of the public library service to communities and individuals Excellent digital skills and the ability to show people how to use a variety of digital devices To find out more and apply click the link: https://orlo.uk/GUStH

We have an exciting opportunity for a Resident Contact Supervisor to join us! This is a full-time, permanent role with hybrid working, and a salary of Â£27,372 - Â£31,169 per annum. The Role: As a Resident Contact Supervisor, you will have key role in managing the day to day running of the contact centre and manage a team of advisors. Dealing with escalations on a complete range of council services. What we are looking for: Ideally, you will have worked in a supervisory or management role preferably in a customer service environment and will be educated to degree level or equivalent., with excellent communication and IT skills. Self-motivated, professional, friendly, enthusiastic, customer focused individuals to join our highly motivated and friendly team. Training will be given. To find out more and apply click the link: https://orlo.uk/Y6Mg2

We have an exciting opportunity for a Principal Ecologist to join us! This is a full-time, permanent role with hybrid working, and a salary of Â£43,063 - Â£47,035 per annum. There is an option for this to be a part time role. Your role will involve: You will provide professional ecological advice and guidance to planning officers, councillors, developers and other stakeholders regarding the assessment, impact and mitigation of development on biodiversity and protected species, particularly with regards to planning applications, development proposals and local planning policy. You will undertake habitat and protected species surveys, when necessary, including Phase 1 habitat surveys and UKHABs assessments. To find out more and apply click the link: https://orlo.uk/ZUKxp

We have an exciting opportunity for a DoLS Administrator to join us! This is a full-time, permanent role which can support hybrid working, and a salary of Â£27,372 - Â£31,169 per annum. Your role will involve: Processing incoming referrals Inputting information into spreadsheets Emailing out work to assessors Dealing with invoices Completing letters based on templates. Dealing with telephone and email enquiries What we are looking for: Able to use Excel, Outlook, Word, Sharepoint and Teams Desirable if you are familiar with Aggresso and Mosaic A highly motivated team player who is keen to learn as this is a very process driven role Able to work on your own initiative To find out more and apply click the link: https://orlo.uk/ge3Zm

We have an exciting opportunity for a Business Service Assistant to join us! This is a full-time 12-month fixed term contract, with flexible working conditions and hybrid working (dependent upon experience), and a salary of Â£24,170 to Â£27,313 per annum. The Role: As part of the wider Revenues and Benefits Service you will have a key role in providing a high-quality administrative service to residents, who are in receipt of Adult Social Care services. What we are looking for: You will have proven skills and experience in a fast-paced administrative role and excellent communications skills, both written and verbal. To find out more and apply click the link: https://orlo.uk/pgR1y

We have an exciting opportunity for a Deputyship Assistant to join us! This is a full-time contract, with flexible working conditions and hybrid working (dependent upon experience), and a salary of Â£24,170 to Â£27,313 per annum. The Role- As part of the wider Revenues and Benefits Service you will have a key role in providing a high-quality administrative service to our Court of Protection deputyship and DWP appointee clients. What we are looking for- You will have proven skills and experience in a fast-paced administrative role. Excellent communications skills, both written and verbal and be able to manage your own workload. To find out more and apply please click the link: https://orlo.uk/PPlDb

We have an exciting opportunity for a Facilities Assistant to join us! This is a full-time, permanent role and a salary of Â£22,216 per annum. The post is suitable for job share. The Role: As a member of the Councilâ€™s Facilities team, you will report to the Facilities Supervisor and help to deliver effective and customer-focused services to both staff and visitors at various Council buildings throughout the Borough. What we are looking for: You will be working within a small team, as well as having regular contact with external contractors. You must be a team player, with a commitment to customer service. To apply and find out more click the link: https://orlo.uk/mC8b4

ðŸš—If you drive into Maidenhead, park up and walk to work, you can get affordable long-stay day parking or season tickets at Hines Meadow, Vicus Way or Stafferton Way car parks. ðŸŽ«You can get season tickets for three months, six months or 12 months, with Vicus Way also having the option of one-month season tickets. ðŸ…¿Find out more and make the most of your parking choices ðŸ‘‰ https://orlo.uk/F0H5m #ParkSmartMaidenhead

We have an exciting opportunity for Benefits Officer to join us! This is a full-time, permanent role with flexible working conditions and hybrid working (dependent upon experience), and a salary of Â£27,372 to Â£31,169 per annum. The Role: As part of the wider Revenues and Benefits Service you will have a key role in providing a high quality services to its residents, who need financial assistance with their rental liability and/or Council Tax. Your role will involve: You will be responsible for accurate and effective processing of both Housing Benefit and Council Tax Support using the Capita Academy processing system and Civica document management system. The service also deals with application for discretionary housing payments. To find out more and apply click the link: https://orlo.uk/I9nx2
